post.body: I've been driving 1 of those around 4 several weeks - borrowed it as my car's been in the shop. HATE IT. EMBARRASSING.
@theflylady @juliejulie RT Help spread the wisdom of good food, fun and retweeting. Tell your friends about @TwitRecipes!
Yes, @healthypaws & other nearby stores flooded earlier this week. @Healthypaws is selling by appointment (inventory is nearby).
Ha! They probably need money from your parking ticket to pay for the snow removal. Vicious cycle.
Then I found your new(ish) account. Local biz is starting to effectively use Twitter - see @kebaba for an example
I'd keep the photo to contest the ticket
That is so lame. Diamond Parking?
either nobody showed up or I arrived too late.I got tea and scone to go.
Was good to see you today! I might be persuaded 2 join you 4 scrabble tourney - even though I haven't played for a LONG time
I need a tea wallet - always stuffing tea bags in my backpack, lunch bag, pockets...
Yes, we could have some unpleasant surprise happenings mid night - they don't want to go out in snow/cold right now as it is.
Might have an order for you - what's the best way to reach you?
Pretty sure it was Jesse
The lost dog or my avatar?
Well I'm certainly not the only one with a pet avatar, LOL, which is why I'm always surprised when somebody mentions it.
Me too. Turns out she is about 16yo and gets a little confused. 2nd time she has wandered away.
It will be good to see you
I'm hoping to sneak out of the home office for Mio.
I've never attempted to make bread before from scratch - this could be an adventure!
Wah! Poor me. Pity Party. Well, I guess I'll clean the house & make that bread I've been thinking about while listening to @theflylady podc.
I can't even do any errands that I need to do b/c I don't trust the damn car.
Just picked up Rodeo shop had for 3 weeks +. Been in shop 4 times since Sept 4 SAME elec prob. Speedom. dsnt wk, chck eng light on. PISSED.
Where can I get a good deal on an Ugly Doll in Bend?
Everybody welcome @healthypaws. After picking up dog food today I was thinking about your store and how you should use twitter.
That scone from Jackson's Corner was sooooo yummy!
Heading down (late) to BendWeb meetup.
Craving baklava. Hmm none in the house for some reason. Will settle for a little swiss dark chocolate soy frozen yogurt.
Interesting SharePoint FAQ: http://www.understandingsharepoint.com/justask/
Mio Sushi may be on for dinner
The lost dog's name was... Jesse? Something like that. They did live over by Empire.
Standing in line at bend broadband to get cable boxes for my Dad.
Hmm. Seems there are several large chunks of roof shingles in my lawn from the wind storms. Assuming they are from MY roof - not good.
It's weird that when I meet local tweeps they say: you're the 1 with the dog <avatar>. Should I stick w Ruby or do you want to see my face?
Found Bend doggy I mentioned this morning reunited with owner , thanks to Craigslist.
Lost dog found wandering 27th NE Bend last night. Elderly, approx 40 lbs, cattle dog mix? Brown & cream. No tail. No id. Very sweet.
Ok first friday was extremely lame.
First friday already! Anybody downtown?
Decompressing w mcnenamins stout from unfun drive to drop kids.Santian sucked,tombstone sucked a little less.
Anything fun for kids to do in Bend tonight? (8-12yos)
SharePoint and workflows are HOT in Bend this week
